thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Cabot Oil and Gas posts smaller loss on $243 mln U.S. tax law benefit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cabot Oil and Gas posts smaller loss on $243 mln U.S. tax law benefit
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Cabot Oil and Gas Corp on Friday reported a smaller fourth-quarter loss, helped by a $242.9 million benefit related to the U.S. tax law reforms.
The company’s net loss narrowed to $44.4 million, or 10 cents per share, in the quarter ended Dec. 31, from $292.8 million, or 63 cents per share, a year earlier.
The Texas-based company’s operating revenue rose to $400.5 million from $316.5 million. (Reporting by Ahmed Farhatha in Bengaluru; Editing by Savio D‘Souza)
